function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Surge in COVID-19 patients requiring space, staff, supplies, and systems to manage capacity","Impact":"Overwhelmed hospital capacity, inability to provide adequate care to COVID-19 patients","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive surge capacity approach, expand space, identify staff, ensure adequate supplies, establish systems to manage demand","Technologies":"Healthcare management software, capacity planning tools","People":"Hospital administrators, healthcare staff","Owner":"Hospital administrators, healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate infection control measures during activities with suspected or confirmed cases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission to healthcare workers and patients","Mitigation":"Enhance safe work practices, implement infection control measures, provide appropriate PPE","Technologies":"Infection control technology, PPE equipment","People":"Healthcare workers, hospital staff","Owner":"Hospital administrators, infection control specialists"},{"Description":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission in healthcare workplaces","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for healthcare workers and patients","Mitigation":"Implement best sanitary standards, reduce transmission risk conceptually and practically","Technologies":"Sanitary equipment, infection control technology","People":"Healthcare workers, hospital staff","Owner":"Hospital administrators, infection control specialists"}]}
